#include <stdio.h>
typedef long long int tep;

 tep fastInput() {
    tep val = 0;
    char c = getchar_unlocked();
    while (c < '0' || c > '9') c = getchar_unlocked();
    while (c >= '0' && c <= '9') 
     {
         val = (val<<1) + (val<<3) + (c-'0');
        c = getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return val;
}


int main()
{
    tep t,m,n,str,i;
    t=fastInput();
    while(t--)
    {
        n=fastInput();
        m=fastInput();
        str=1;
        
        if(m<=n)
         printf("0\n");
        else
        {
            for(i=n ; i>=2 ; i-- )
            {
                
                str*=i;
                
                str=str%m;
                
                
            }
            
            
            printf("%lld\n",str);
        }
         
        
      
        
        
    }
    
    return 0;
    
    
}
